fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Decide if you will go on alert. (3 uses)
- Redirect a player to yourself. (1 use)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- While on alert, you gain Basic Defense, and you will deliver a Powerful Attack to all who visit you.
- You can only use your Redirect ability while on alert.
- Control and Roleblock Immunity
